mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (ROOMNO, MSGNO, TYPE, MSG, USERNAME, CHATDATE) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{msgNo}, #{type}, #{msg}, #{userName}, #{chatDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE ROOMNO = #{roomNo} AND (TYPE = 'chat' OR TYPE = 'EVENT' OR TYPE = 'ready' OR TYPE = 'unReady' OR TYPE = 'enter' OR TYPE = 'leave' OR TYPE = 'MAFIA_WIN' OR TYPE = 'CITIZEN_WIN' OR TYPE = 'NEUTRALITY_WIN') ORDER BY CHATDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE ROOMNO = #{roomNo} AND (TYPE = #{type} OR TYPE = 'chat' OR TYPE = 'EVENT' OR TYPE = 'ready' OR TYPE = 'unReady' OR TYPE = 'enter' OR TYPE = 'leave' OR TYPE = 'MAFIA_WIN' OR TYPE = 'CITIZEN_WIN' OR TYPE = 'NEUTRALITY_WIN') ORDER BY CHATDATE DESC

SELECT '{' || '"eventNo": ' || EVENT_NO || ',' || '"content": "' || REPLACE(CONTENT, '!!!!', #{userName}) || '",' || '"imageUrl": "' || IMAGE_URL || '"' || '}' AS JSON_RESULT FROM GAME_EVENT WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
